channel.title: go on Euraxluo Blog
channel.description: Recent content in go on Euraxluo Blog

item.description: 关于切片和slice的内存共享 package main import ( "bufio" "bytes" "errors" "fmt" _errors "github.com/pkg/errors" "os" "reflect" "regexp" "strconv" "strings" "sync" "sync/atomic" "time" ) func main() { /** * @Description: foo boo内存共享 * @param []int * @param 5 */ foo := make([]int, 5) foo[3] = 3 foo[4] = 4 boo := foo[1:4] boo[1] = 2 for i := 0; i < 5; i++ { println(foo[i]) } /** * @Description: 当capcity够的时候，那么就不会重新分配内存 * @param []int * @param 8 */ a := make([]int, 8) b := a[1:8] b[1] = 1 //[01.
